    • testCollision

      public void testCollision()
      The testCollision method. Moves the player against a stone and verify its coords. If there is a collision, coords don't change.

      public void testGravity()
      The testGravity method. Makes a stone fall and checks its coords.

      public void testMoveStone()
      The testMoveStone method. Makes the player moving a stone and checks the latter coords.
